item.title: Drop me a line!
item.description: Feel free to reach out to me through any of the following methods: Email You can email me at amaad.michael@gmail.com. Social Media LinkedIn: A. Michael Tatum GitHub: amaad-michael Instagram: amaad_michael Location I am based slightly north of the Austin, TX metro area.

item.title: Greetings!
item.description: I am a Cloud Linux Engineer based right outside the Austin metro area, adept at managing complex infrastructure. I orchestrate servers across both Debian and RHEL distributions. I audit and enhance system security using tools like Kali and BlackArch to ensure a robust security posture. I focus on cloud platforms, system hardening, automation, and Infrastructure-as-Code, aimed at optimizing performance and reliability. I write technical papers and documentation, clearly articulating complex technical concepts.
